findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` may abort with OUT_OF_GAS exception due to long excluded addresses lists.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Owner has excessive privileges that can be misused.
